languages.text: "Вам и не нужно. Теперь я точно знаю, чего хочу..." {n}Кассия обхватывает вашу шею руками, и когти ее нежно щекочут затылок.{/n} "Вас, {name}. Здесь и сейчас".

traits.locale_text: "Вам и не нужно. Теперь я точно знаю, чего хочу..." {n}Кассия обхватывает вашу шею руками, и когти ее нежно щекочут затылок.{/n} "Вас, {name}. Здесь и сейчас".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You don't need to. Now I know exactly what I want..." {n}Cassia puts her hands around your neck, her claws ticklish against your skin.{/n} "You, {name}. Here and now."

languages.text: “你不用再克制自己。现在，我很清楚我究竟想要什么……”{n}卡西娅双手环住你的脖子，尖利的指甲轻轻地划过你的皮肤。{/n}“我想要你，{name}。就在此时，就在这里。”
languages.original_text: "You don't need to. Now I know exactly what I want..." {n}Cassia puts her hands around your neck, her claws ticklish against your skin.{/n} "You, {name}. Here and now."

traits.locale_text: “你不用再克制自己。现在，我很清楚我究竟想要什么……”{n}卡西娅双手环住你的脖子，尖利的指甲轻轻地划过你的皮肤。{/n}“我想要你，{name}。就在此时，就在这里。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das müsst Ihr nicht. Ich weiß nun genau, was ich will ..." {n}Cassia legt ihre Hände um deinen Hals. Ihre Krallen kitzeln auf deiner Haut.{/n} "Euch, {name}. Hier und jetzt."
languages.original_text: "You don't need to. Now I know exactly what I want..." {n}Cassia puts her hands around your neck, her claws ticklish against your skin.{/n} "You, {name}. Here and now."

traits.locale_text: "Das müsst Ihr nicht. Ich weiß nun genau, was ich will ..." {n}Cassia legt ihre Hände um deinen Hals. Ihre Krallen kitzeln auf deiner Haut.{/n} "Euch, {name}. Hier und jetzt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Rien ne vous y oblige. À présent, je sais exactement ce que je veux... » {n}Cassia pose ses mains sur votre cou, ses griffes chatouillant votre peau.{/n} « C'est vous que je veux, {name}. Ici et maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "You don't need to. Now I know exactly what I want..." {n}Cassia puts her hands around your neck, her claws ticklish against your skin.{/n} "You, {name}. Here and now."

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne vous y oblige. À présent, je sais exactement ce que je veux... » {n}Cassia pose ses mains sur votre cou, ses griffes chatouillant votre peau.{/n} « C'est vous que je veux, {name}. Ici et maintenant. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No hace falta. Ahora sé exactamente lo que quiero...». {n}Cassia pone sus manos alrededor de tu cuello. Sus garras te hacen cosquillas.{/n} «A usted, {name}. Aquí y ahora».
languages.original_text: "You don't need to. Now I know exactly what I want..." {n}Cassia puts her hands around your neck, her claws ticklish against your skin.{/n} "You, {name}. Here and now."

traits.locale_text: «No hace falta. Ahora sé exactamente lo que quiero...». {n}Cassia pone sus manos alrededor de tu cuello. Sus garras te hacen cosquillas.{/n} «A usted, {name}. Aquí y ahora».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「その必要はありません。あたくしは自分が何を必要としているか、正確に分かっています…」{n}カシアはあなたの首に自分の腕を回す。爪があなたの皮膚を刺激する。{/n}「ねえ、{name}様。今ここで」
languages.original_text: "You don't need to. Now I know exactly what I want..." {n}Cassia puts her hands around your neck, her claws ticklish against your skin.{/n} "You, {name}. Here and now."

languages.text: "Olma zaten. Artık ne istediğimi çok iyi biliyorum..." {n}Cassia, ellerini senin boynuna götürüyor. Pençeleri, cildini gıdıklıyor.{/n} "Seni istiyorum {name}. Hemen, şimdi istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "You don't need to. Now I know exactly what I want..." {n}Cassia puts her hands around your neck, her claws ticklish against your skin.{/n} "You, {name}. Here and now."
